attr.title: Finding Paradise
attr.desc: Finding Paradise is an adventure game developed and published by Freebird Games. Serving as a sequel to To the Moon and A Bird Story, the story continues with doctors Eva Rosalene and Neil Watts as they help to fulfill a wish for Colin Reeds, who is now a bedridden old man.
attr.inst: If using the GOG Version place the finding_paradise_*.sh installer to the root of the finding_paradise folder or extract the contents of the data/noarch/game/ folder into finding_paradise/gamedata/
